userInformationPage.title: Users list
userInformationPage.noRoles: No role for the selected user.

newUser.title: New User
newUser.required: Field is required and cannot be empty

passwordRules.forbidden: The password must not contain portions of Email, Organisation name, Name, Surname, or Username greater than {{num}} characters.

unauthorized.title: Role Restricted Access
unauthorized.message: Access denied. Your role does not grant permission to view this content.

message.400: Your request could not be understood by the server due to invalid syntax or parameters.
message.401: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please ensure you are logged in with the correct credentials.
message.403: Access denied. Your role does not grant permission to view this content.
message.404: The resource you are looking for could not be found on the server.
message.500: The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Please try again later.
message.501: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
message.502: The server, acting as a gateway, received an invalid response from the upstream server.
message.503: The server is currently unavailable due to overload or maintenance. Please try again later.
message.504: The server, acting as a gateway, did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.
message.505: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request.
message.508: The server detected a loop while processing the request.
message.511: The client must authenticate to gain network access.

roleDetail.title: Role Detail
roleDetail.messageChanges: This will change the attributes of this role, potentially affecting many users. Do you wish to proceed?
roleDetail.disabledExplanation: This attribute can't be selected because it's not assigned to the participant or assignable to a role.
roleDetail.updateErrorMessage: Changes could not be saved. PLease try again later.
